__e: Whatever happened, and hope for the best.
Better hope it'll work on these guys, too.
About all we can do... is take as many of'em with us as we can, and hope for the best.
I know it's too soon to expect you to see it that way, lutie
All I can hope that is that you do their ideas in your head, otherwise, where wherever they are ...
I guess it would be too much to hope that you two are finished.
About all we can do... is take as many of'em with us as we can, and hope for the best.
All you can do is work and hope one day something good will turn up.
Well, you can't really expect me to believe it.
How can you expect us to be unemotional when at least one person is dying every day from a disease that doesn't even have a name?
I know I can't expect anything from you...
I found myself wishing with all my heart that you would be happy.
Well, all we can do is hope he comes to pretty soon.
The only emotion I feel about one of these is a faint hope it may be a party official.
But when you got a police officer that witnessed it... you expect that they would know a little more than she knew.

If a gentleman received an invitation to visit a friend who lived in the city while the wife and children were on vacation, in addition to good food and clean linen, he could expect a comely Negress to share his bed at night.
Thank you so much for showing the concern on our visit to your factory. Hope to meet you soon and hope a long business relationship with you and your company.
I know I should be wishing they'd come quickly and it'll all be over, but all I can think of is... in one hour we'll say good-bye.
I have not found the facts about this but we must hope that they are doing well.
The best I can hope for after tomorrow is a field cart or a sack of hay from time to time.
Because every patient has the right to expect treatment
Under the circumstances, our only option is to wait for it to stop.
